bibdata.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Measurement of Field Intensity Above 300 MC from Radio Frequency Industrial, Scientific, and Medical Equipment
IEEE Recommended Practice for Measurement of Field Intensity Above 300 MC from Radio Frequency Industrial, Scientific, and Medical Equipment

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The following topics are dealt with: field intensity measurement; standard measuring method; symbols, units and abbreviations; methods of measurement; antenna design; antenna gain measurements; associated measuring equipment; measurements on production equipment; measurement precautions and factors affecting measurement accuracy.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
